channel.title: Need help please urgent npc help
channel.description:
hi i run a 317 how do i make a npc that looks like this: [url=http://prntscr.com/7tycl3]Screenshot by Lightshot[/url]
all the tutorials are 667 i want to make another one of my choice please help please!!!
[url=http://prntscr.com/7tyhdk]http://prntscr.com/7tyhdk[/url]
this is whats in entity def for the npc type i want please how would i write it so the npc is wearin gilded plate, legs,helm and a flamebow
